title: Jayminat
author: Jayminat
content: i am web developer from indiai usally create crypto and airdrop related website if anyone want to create there own presale website or Crypto Website Or Any Other type of website then you can message me on TelegramMY Telegram Link is https://telegram.me/jayminat

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: You offer your website building services, right? If so, it would be more appropriate to post this type of content in the Services section of the forum.

comments.author: Jayminat
comments.body: okay sir i will post this content in serice ssection

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Jayminat on March 05, 2023, 05:31:23 PMi am web developer from indiai usally create crypto and airdrop related website if anyone want to create there own presale website or Crypto Website Or Any Other type of website then you can message me on TelegramMY Telegram Link is https://telegram.me/jayminatCan you provide a portfolio explaining all the websites you've designed, the programming languages you're fluent in, and what you can do and pay per hour?Asking users to message you on Telegram is not a wise move, you are a website developer and therefore it was necessary to show your skills first, at least to have a personal website in which you update your work periodically.

comments.author: savetheFORUM
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on March 09, 2023, 11:03:31 AMCan you provide a portfolio explaining all the websites you've designed, the programming languages you're fluent in, and what you can do and pay per hour?Asking users to message you on Telegram is not a wise move, you are a website developer and therefore it was necessary to show your skills first, at least to have a personal website in which you update your work periodically.That's right. It is always the best practice for a developer or any service provider to have a dedicated portfolio to showcase their past work or at least some samples of what they can actually do so that those who may wish to hire them can see how capable they actually are. Having a portfolio can obviously boost the chances of getting hired more quickly.In OP's case, I believe that he is not like a professional developer, and he probably has just started working or maybe only did a couple or a few projects and that's why he doesn't have a portfolio set up yet.
